name: naive-ui
description: A Vue UI Framework. Caring About Styles, Themed, Batteries Included, Not Rather Slow.

scripts.build:js: npm run generate-version && npm run clean && rollup -c
scripts.build:package: npm run generate-version && npm run clean && node build/build-fonts.js && node build/build-icons.js && rollup -c
scripts.build:site: npm run generate-version && npm run build:package && rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build
scripts.build:doc: npm run generate-version && npm run build && rm -rf build-doc/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config build/webpack.doc.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib && rm -rf es && rm -rf dist
scripts.dev: npm run generate-version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite
scripts.tusimple:dev: npm run generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config build/webpack.tusimple-dev.js
scripts.tusimple:build:doc: npm run generate && npm run build && rm -rf build-doc/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config build/webpack.tusimple-doc.js
scripts.tusimple:release:doc: npm run tusimple:build:doc && node build-doc/generate-deploy-sh.js && sudo bash build-doc/deploy-doc.sh

author: 07akioni
